name: prog
title: __Prog Roles Menu__
description: Prog Roles are obtainable by anyone and are used to ping people for certain prog parties.

fields.name: Ultimate Prog Button
fields.value: Use this button to add or remove a role to be pinged for certain Ultimate parties.

fields.name: Savage/Extreme Prog Button
fields.value: Use this button to add or remove a role to be pinged for certain Savage/Extreme parties.

fields.name: Other Roles Button
fields.value: Includes a global BiS Farm, Ultimate Unlock, and Mercenary roles.
